description: Bootstrap a Linux server with the Chef Client.

version.description: Version of the Chef client to install.

bucket.description: S3 Bucket where the client.rb and Chef validator .pem can be retrieved from.

clientrb.description: Name of the client.rb file in the above S3 Bukcet used to configure the Chef Client.

validatorpem.description: Name of the .pem file in the above S3 Bukcet used to authenticate the Chef Client.

runlist.description: Name of the runlist file in the above S3 Bukcet that will be used to bootstrap the node with.

environment.description: Name of the Chef Server Environment to play the node.

runCommand: aws s3 cp s3://{{ bucket }}/{{ clientrb }} /etc/chef/{{ clientrb }}
aws s3 cp s3://{{ bucket }}/{{ validatorpem }} /etc/chef/{{ validatorpem }}
aws s3 cp s3://{{ bucket }}/{{ runlist }} /tmp/{{ runlist }}
